name: The Way - Concept Demo
description:
***Level design is purely concept and will undergo heavy changes coming updates***

Play model is only temp, dont worry.

I spent the last 3 days, coming up with this idea and learning UE4.

I plan to turn this into a full game, NOTHING IS FINALIZED IN DEMO!!! 

I plan to update often. I currently have 4 levels, wich will change weekly.

Pause does not work at the moment.

Planned Features:   Full UI, Save Progress, Update Textures, Add Many Levels, Tweak Some Settings, Add More Powers, and MUCH MORE!!!!
